-- Drop the procedure if it exists
IF OBJECT_ID('usp_CreateSchemas', 'P') IS NOT NULL
    DROP PROCEDURE usp_CreateSchemas;
GO

-- Create the stored procedure
CREATE PROCEDURE usp_CreateSchemas
AS
BEGIN
    SET NOCOUNT ON;

    -- Create the Dwh schema
    IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.schemas WHERE name = 'Dwh')
    BEGIN
        EXEC('CREATE SCHEMA Dwh');
    END

    -- Create the Staging schema
    IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.schemas WHERE name = 'Staging')
    BEGIN
        EXEC('CREATE SCHEMA Staging');
    END

    -- Create the Metadata schema. This schema is commented out as it is optional thus allowing decision to add them later.
/**
    IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.schemas WHERE name = 'Metadata')
    BEGIN
        EXEC('CREATE SCHEMA Metadata');
    END
**/
END;
